revised_title: Observatory of the Collegio Romano: Description and Instrumentation
tldr: This article describes the construction and arrangement of the Observatory of the Collegio Romano in Rome. It provides details on the building's parts and the instruments used, which are illustrated with plans and drawings. The author, P.A. Secchi, communicates this information to the reader with the help of George Rennie, Esq., F.R.S.
